name: Cutman's Nightmare REMASTERED
description:
Why did i remake this?

The Original mod was trash, nuff said.

One day, a group of robbers had decided to rob Cutman's House to get some Kirbies. "Sooo...  Why are we robbing this place?"   said Quint (you) "CUZ WE RUNNING OUT OF F**KING MONEY SINCE WE WERE ARESTED." Said Gutsman (Your Boss) "Why are we getting Kirbies?" You asked, "CUZ 40 KIRBIES = $300.00 WE CAN GET A F**KING NINTENDO SWITCH WITH DAT F**KING CASH." Gutsman replied. Then Elec Man was like "s**t dude, we finna get robbed." "Let's rape Report them to the cops!" Ice Dood replied. Now Cutman, Iceman, Ghetto Elecman, and Mega Man himself are after you and try to stop you from getting those K I R B S.
